Package ViewController

Class AddProductScreenController

java.lang.Object
ViewController.AddProductScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddProductScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Author:
Nyssa Robinson Add Product Screen Application Controller This class is the functionality to add a product within the Add Product Screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddProductScreenController

      public AddProductScreenController()

  • Method Details

    • addPartToProductButton

      void addPartToProductButton()
      This method has a part object added to associated part table from all parts table. Error display message when there is no part selected Confirmation display message when part object is successfully added to associated part table.

    • cancelAddProductButton

      void cancelAddProductButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method has a confirmation display message that loads the Main Screen Controller.
      Parameters:
      event - cancel add product button action
      Throws:
      IOException - from FXMLLoader

    • deletePartFromProductButton

      void deletePartFromProductButton()
      This method has a confirmation display message and deletes selected associated part(s) from deletePartFromProduct table. Error display message when there is no part selected

    • saveAddProductButton

      void saveAddProductButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method replaces the modified product in the inventory and then loads the Main Screen Controller. Validated text fields w/error display message(s) for fields that have invalid values/blank.
      Parameters:
      event - save add product button action

    • searchProductKeyPressed

      void searchProductKeyPressed()
      This method refills add part to product table with all products when search product txt field is blank.

    • searchProductButton

      void searchProductButton()
      This method launches part search according to the value within the search product text field. Then refreshes add partToProduct table w/searched results. Information display message when part is not found. Search parts by name or ID

    • returnToMainScreen

      private void returnToMainScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method loads the Main Screen
      Parameters:
      event - passed from the parent method
      Throws:
      IOException - from FXMLLoader

    • minValid

      private boolean minValid(int min, int max)
      This confirms that the minimum is greater than zero and less than the maximum. Error display message when minimum doesn't match requirements
      Parameters:
      min - minimum number value for part
      max - maximum number value for part
      Returns:
      confirming if minimum value is valid

    • inventoryValid

      private boolean inventoryValid(int min, int max, int stock)
      This confirms that the minimum is greater than zero and less than the maximum. Error display message when inventory doesn't match requirements
      Parameters:
      min - minimum number value for part
      max - maximum number value for part
      stock - inventory level for part
      Returns:
      confirming if inventory value is vaild

    • displayAlert

      private void displayAlert(int alertType)
      This method has multiple alert error and information display messages.
      Parameters:
      alertType - alert message selector

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      This method adds product to the Main Screen from add product screen when controller is initialized.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - relative paths are resolved from the root object's location, or null if location is unknown.
      resources - used to localize the root object or null if no localization was done.
